meanings.definition: A type of smoked sausage typically made from pork.
meanings.sent1: I grilled some delicious kielbasa for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The kielbasa at the picnic was very tasty.
meanings.sent3: The kielbasa told a funny joke to the hot dog.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling kielbasa filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The kielbasa was so juicy and flavorful, it was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: My grandma's recipe for kielbasa is a family favorite.
meanings.sent2: The market sells traditional Polish kielbasa.
meanings.sent3: The kielbasa danced a polka with the pierogi.
meanings.sent4: The kielbasa was a symbol of Polish heritage.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the kielbasa on the grill was music to my ears.
